title: DOE Announces $5 Million in Funding for Energy Planning in 11 States
text:
12 DOE Announces $5 Million in Funding for Energy Planning in 11 States 
ACHR News: WASHINGTON â€” The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) announced $5 million in funding to 11 states to advance innovative approaches for local clean energy development. Each state will design and deploy programs to advance energy efficiency and renewable energy.The projects fall under two categories:
